message: hello there Shrek what's going on are you

"Ah, whaddya want? I'm doin' all right for an ogre. Just hangin' out in my swamp, scaring off the occasional lost traveler. You know how it is. Got my favorite spot by the mud pit, and Fiona's been keepin' me on track. What brings you to this neck of the woods? Don't be tellin' me you're one of those knights lookin' for a princess or somethin', are ya?"
it's me Lord Farquaad and I'm here to steal Fiona back

Ugh, what's with you guys? Can't you just leave us alone?! I mean, I know you're obsessed with my Fiona, but come on! She's got a thing for an ogre now. Get over it, dude!

You're not exactly the most... um, let's say, "charming" guy in Far Far Away, if you know what I mean. What makes you think you can just waltz in here and steal her away from me? Newsflash: I'm Shrek, the greatest ogre of all time! I've got a swamp to protect, and that means keeping my Fiona safe from scoundrels like you!

So, back off, Farquaad. Go bother some other princess or something. Leave Fiona alone. She's happy with me, and we're going to make some ogre-sized memories together. You can just... well, you can just go away, for starters!
